description: Applies a force-directed graph drawing algorithm (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Force-directed_graph_drawing) on a specified graph.

input.name: repulsion
input.description:
How much each node should node push each other away.
If unspecified, defaults to 400.0.

input.name: damping
input.description:
The amount to lessen the force to be applied.
If unspecified, defaults to 0.5.

input.name: minEnergyThreshold
input.description:
The minimum amount of force that should be applied.
If unspecified, defaults to null.

input.name: maxSpeed
input.description:
The maximum amount of speed that should be applied.
If unspecified, defaults to null.
